name: ext_R4B_EvidenceVariable_ch_timeFromStart
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.EvidenceVariable.characteristic.timeFromStart for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents EvidenceVariable.characteristic.timeFromStart from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/EvidenceVariable|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Observation time from study start
element.definition: Indicates duration, period, or point of observation from the participant's study entry.
element.comment: `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.timeFromStart` maps to R4 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.timeFromStart`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
